price: 54.Kani (barwaaqada iyo baraarahan) waa risiqayaga (la idiin yaboohay Qiyaamada) aan dhammaaneyn weligii.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزۡقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lariz'qunā mā lahu min nafādin
